verses.verse: And Joseph<WH3130> was brought<WH3381> down<WH3381> to Egypt;<WH4714> and Potiphar,<WH6318> an officer<WH5631> of Pharaoh,<WH6547> captain<WH8269> of the guard,<WH2876> an Egyptian,<WH4713> bought<WH7069> him of the hands<WH3027> of the Ishmeelites,<WH3459> which<WH834> had brought<WH3381> him down<WH3381> thither.<WH8033>
And the LORD<WH3068> was with Joseph,<WH3130> and he was a prosperous<WH6743> man;<WH376> and he was in the house<WH1004> of his master<WH113> the Egyptian.<WH4713>
And his master<WH113> saw<WH7200> that the LORD<WH3068> was with him, and that the LORD<WH3068> made all<WH3605> that he did<WH6213> to prosper<WH6743> in his hand.<WH3027>

And Joseph<WH3130> found<WH4672> grace<WH2580> in his sight,<WH5869> and he served<WH8334> him: and he made him overseer<WH6485> over<WH5921> his house,<WH1004> and all<WH3605> that he had<WH3426> he put<WH5414> into his hand.<WH3027>

And it came<WH1961> to pass from the time that he had<WH3426> made him overseer<WH6485> in his house,<WH1004> and over<WH5921> all<WH3605> that he had,<WH3426> that the LORD<WH3068> blessed<WH1288> the Egyptian's<WH4713> house<WH1004> for Joseph's<WH3130> sake;<WH1558> and the blessing<WH1293> of the LORD<WH3068> was on all<WH3605> that he had<WH3426> in the house,<WH1004> and in the field.<WH7704>

And he left<WH5800> all<WH3605> that he had in Joseph's<WH3130> hand;<WH3027> and he knew<WH3045> not ought<WH3972> he had, save<WH3588> <WH518> the bread<WH3899> which<WH834> he did eat.<WH398> And Joseph<WH3130> was a goodly<WH3303> <WH8389> person, and well<WH3303> favored.<WH4758>
And it came<WH1961> to pass after<WH310> these<WH428> things,<WH1697> that his master's<WH113> wife<WH802> cast<WH5375> her eyes<WH5869> on Joseph;<WH3130> and she said,<WH559> Lie<WH7901> with me.

But he refused,<WH3985> and said<WH559> to his master's<WH113> wife,<WH802> Behold,<WH2005> my master<WH113> wotteth<WH3045> not what<WH4100> is with me in the house,<WH1004> and he has committed<WH5414> all<WH3605> that he has<WH3426> to my hand;<WH3027>

There is none<WH369> greater<WH1419> in this<WH2088> house<WH1004> than<WH4480> I; neither<WH3808> has he kept<WH2820> back<WH2820> any<WH3972> thing<WH3972> from me but you, because<WH834> you are his wife:<WH802> how<WH349> then can I do<WH6213> this<WH2063> great<WH1419> wickedness,<WH7451> and sin<WH2398> against God?<WH430>
And it came<WH1961> to pass, as she spoke<WH1696> to Joseph<WH3130> day<WH3117> by day,<WH3117> that he listened<WH8085> not to her, to lie<WH7901> by her, or to be with her.

And it came<WH1961> to pass about this<WH2088> time,<WH3117> that Joseph went<WH935> into the house<WH1004> to do<WH6213> his business;<WH4399> and there was none<WH369> of the men<WH582> of the house<WH1004> there<WH8033> within.<WH1004>
And she caught<WH8610> him by his garment,<WH899> saying,<WH559> Lie<WH7901> with me: and he left<WH5800> his garment<WH899> in her hand,<WH3027> and fled,<WH5127> and got<WH3318> him out.
And it came<WH1961> to pass, when she saw<WH7200> that he had left<WH5800> his garment<WH899> in her hand,<WH3027> and was fled<WH5127> forth,<WH2351>

That she called<WH7121> to the men<WH582> of her house,<WH1004> and spoke<WH559> to them, saying,<WH559> See,<WH7200> he has brought<WH935> in an Hebrew<WH5680> to us to mock<WH6711> us; he came<WH935> in to me to lie<WH7901> with me, and I cried<WH7121> with a loud<WH1419> voice:<WH6963>

And it came<WH1961> to pass, when he heard<WH8085> that I lifted<WH7311> up my voice<WH6963> and cried,<WH7121> that he left<WH5800> his garment<WH899> with me, and fled,<WH5127> and got<WH3318> him out.
And she laid<WH5117> up his garment<WH899> by her, until<WH5704> his lord<WH113> came<WH935> home.<WH1004>

And she spoke<WH1696> to him according to these<WH428> words,<WH1697> saying,<WH559> The Hebrew<WH5680> servant,<WH5650> which<WH834> you have brought<WH935> to us, came<WH935> in to me to mock<WH6711> me:
And it came<WH1961> to pass, as I lifted<WH7311> up my voice<WH6963> and cried,<WH7121> that he left<WH5800> his garment<WH899> with me, and fled<WH5127> out.

And it came<WH1961> to pass, when his master<WH113> heard<WH8085> the words<WH1697> of his wife,<WH802> which<WH834> she spoke<WH1696> to him, saying,<WH559> After this<WH428> manner<WH1697> did<WH6213> your servant<WH5650> to me; that his wrath<WH639> was kindled.<WH2734>

And Joseph's<WH3130> master<WH113> took<WH3947> him, and put<WH5414> him into<WH413> the prison,<WH1004> <WH5470> a place<WH4725> where<WH834> the king's<WH4428> prisoners<WH615> were bound:<WH631> and he was there<WH8033> in the prison.<WH1004> <WH5470>
But the LORD<WH3068> was with Joseph,<WH3130> and showed<WH5186> him mercy,<WH2617> and gave<WH5414> him favor<WH2580> in the sight<WH5869> of the keeper<WH8269> of the prison.<WH1004>

And the keeper<WH8269> of the prison<WH1004> <WH5470> committed<WH5414> to Joseph's<WH3130> hand<WH3027> all<WH3605> the prisoners<WH615> that were in the prison;<WH1004> <WH5470> and whatever<WH3605> <WH834> they did<WH6213> there,<WH8033> he was the doer<WH6213> of it.

The keeper<WH8269> of the prison<WH1004> <WH5470> looked<WH7200> not to any<WH3972> thing<WH3972> that was under his hand;<WH3027> because<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> was with him, and that which<WH834> he did,<WH6213> the LORD<WH3068> made it to prosper.<WH6743>
